item.title: Rails, HAML, alternatible CSS for tables
item.description: If you've done any kind of table display in Rails, you've probably discovered the useful 'cycle' method: <tr class="<%= cycle("even", "odd") %>"> This works after you've set two CSS classes between which you want to alternate - in my example, even and odd, because I have such amazing imagination. Come to think of it, to make my code more readable, it should be 'lightbg' and 'darkbg', or something similar.
